item.description:
Aspirging is cleansing oneself in preparation, Attunement is aligning our energies with those of others, becoming “in tune”. Just as we would prepare our tools before using them in ritual, we should consider how our own auric energies should be cleansed and attuned. This class examines the importance of doing so along with techniques to effectively prepare ourselves, our tools and our surroundings.

Class starts at 6PM Open Circle to follow at 7:30PM EPT (Eastern Pagan Time)
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Aspirgment and Attunement
